title: Borderlands 2 v1.7.0 DLC Update Patch
description:
Game: Borderlands 2
Version: v1.7.0 
Supported languages: English
Information Release Group: 3DM/SKIDROW 
Protection: Steam

*I put the files in an installer for better compression
*Crack SKIDROW

Borderlands 2 Update +DLC's 
27-Nov-2013 (require all previous updates to be installed) 


- Note after update game is listed as 1.7.0 

Included New DLC:
- Headhunter 2: Wattle Gobbler
- Headhunter 3: How Marcus Saved Mercenary Day


Big thanks to  ^^nosTEAM^^18024 for providing this update
